item.title: Calming & Cleansing...Detox Bath Salts
item.description:
Calming & Cleansing...Detox Bath Salts

Here is an alternative to my Lavender Relaxing Bath Salts....This one is divine in smell... both Men and Women like this one - yes it is a little more flowery, but the benefits are one to be enjoyed by all.

item.title: Relaxing DIY Bath Salts
item.description:
Relaxing DIY Bath Salts

You too can make some fabulous & therapeutic bath salts...add your favourite essential oil(s), rest back and soak in the delights!

item.title: Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread
item.description:
Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread

Ever gone to the kitchen, opened the fridge & just stood in front of the cold opening just staring at the contents blindly thinking "I have nothing to eat!"....? Well that was me the other day, it was ridiculous...

item.title: Best Ever DIY Deodorant!
item.description:
Best Ever DIY Deodorant!

Ooh, I am excited to share with you...the best homemade do-it-yourself (DIY) deodorant ever!!! I am actually surprised that I make & use it...but I tell you what, I am totally converted & will not be returning to that shop bought stuff again...

item.title: Homemade Loot...it’s all good!
item.description:
Homemade Loot...it’s all good!

I have chosen to use more of a natural approach to life in general for many reasons such as:

I have recently been participating in an online aromatherapy course, as well as researching like a crazy woman about making homemade DIY products for cleaning the house, body and general natural solutions for life.
